HMM Report¶

represent the results of a HMMer search on a genome with a profile. The report has some method to extract informations needed for the expert rules to decides if a system of secretion is present in the genome.

HMMReport API reference¶

class txsscanlib.report.HMMReport(gene, hmmer_output, cfg)[source]¶

handle HMM report. extract a synthetic report from the raw hmmer output this class is an abstract class. there is 2 implementation of this abstract class depending if the genome baes is ordered or not.

__init__(gene, hmmer_output, cfg)[source]¶
Parameters:
  • gene (txsscanlib.gene.Gene object) – the gene corresponding to this profile
  • hmmer_output (string) – The path to hmmer output file
  • cfg (txsscanlib.config.Config object) – the configuration
__metaclass__¶

alias of ABCMeta

__weakref__¶

list of weak references to the object (if defined)

best_hit()[source]¶

return the best hit when multiple hits

extract()[source]¶

Parse the output file of hmmer and produced a new synthetic report file. containing selected and sorted hits. ( abstract method must be implemented in inherited classes )

save_extract()[source]¶

write the string representation of the extact report in a file. the name of this file is the concatenation of the gene and the res_extract_suffix from config

UnOrderedHMMReport¶

class txsscanlib.report.UnOrderedHMMReport(gene, hmmer_output, cfg)[source]¶

handle HMM report. extract a synthetic report from the raw hmmer output

OrderedHMMReport¶

class txsscanlib.report.OrderedHMMReport(gene, hmmer_output, cfg)[source]¶

handle HMM report. extract a synthetic report from the raw hmmer output

extract()[source]¶

Parse the output file of hmmer compute from an unordered genes base and produced a new synthetic report file.

Hit¶

class txsscanlib.report.Hit(gene, system, hit_id, hit_seq_length, replicon_name, position_hit, i_eval, score, profile_coverage, sequence_coverage, begin_match, end_match)[source]¶

handle hits found by HMM. the hit are instanciate by HMMReport.extract() method

__init__(gene, system, hit_id, hit_seq_length, replicon_name, position_hit, i_eval, score, profile_coverage, sequence_coverage, begin_match, end_match)[source]¶
Parameters:
  • gene (txsscanlib.gene.Gene object) – the gene corresponding to this profile
  • system (txsscanlib.system.System object) – the system to which this gene belongs
  • hit_id (integer) – the identifier of the hit
  • hit_seq_length – the length of the hit sequence
  • replicon_name (string) – the name of the replicon
  • position_hit (integer) – the position of the hit on the sequence?
  • i_eval (float) – the best-domain evalue
  • score (float) – the score of the hit
  • profile_coverage (float) – percentage of the profile that matches the hit sequence
  • sequence_coverage (float) – percentage of the hit sequence that matches the profile
  • begin_match (integer) – where the hit with the profile starts in the sequence
  • end_match (integer) – where the hit with the profile ends in the sequence
__weakref__¶

list of weak references to the object (if defined)

get_position()¶

returns the position of the hit

get_syst_inter_gene_max_space()¶

returns the ‘inter_gene_max_space’ parameter defined for the system of the hit
